title: UniBond Anti-Mould White, Waterproof Mould Protection, Long-lasting White Silicone Sealant for Kitchen & Bathroom, Powerful Bath Sealant, 1 x 274g Cartridge
features: Anti mould sealant - Once dry, the UniBond sealant forms a permanently flexible, mould resistant & waterproof sealant, ensuring strong seals and preventing mould growth.
Specially formulated - The formula of this shower sealant is ideal for warm and humid environments such as bathrooms, kitchens and other tiled areas or surfaces.
High adhesion - Create a perfect and long-lasting seal with this durable, high-strength kitchen sealant. Ensure a mould free finish with regular cleaning of the sealant.
Easy-to-use - Complete your jobs quickly: after applying with a gun, the white kitchen silicone seal is 'touch dry' within just 20 minutes and fully dry within 24 hours.
Practical Delivery - UniBond Anti-Mould White, sanitary sealant for kitchens & bathrooms preventing mould growth, silicone acetoxy formula, white, 1 x 274g Cartridge
description: From the manufacturer About UniBond In the UK, UniBond offers a wide range of DIY products - construction adhesives, sealants and tile adhesives. By offering guidance and smart total bonding solutions, it simplifies every kind of DIY job for both inside and outside the house. UniBond Anti-Mould White – For New Strong and Long-Lasting Seals! Are you looking for a powerful solution to protect your bathroom and kitchen from mould? UniBond Anti-Mould White ensures a permanently flexible, mould resistant & waterproof sealant. It is ideal for use in warm and humid environments such as bathrooms and kitchens. Help the seals around your bath, toilet or kitchen sink quickly look professional again with a user-friendly and precise application cartridge. The silicone is touch dry within 20 minutes and fully dry in 24 hours. For use in warm, humid environments (e.g. bathroom & kitchen) * Long-lasting with high adhesion Touch dry in 20 mins, fully dry in 24 hours One cartridge lasts for 1x bath, 2x showers & 2x sinks Colour: White Technology: Silicone Acetoxy Format: 1 x 274g cartridge *Not recommended for permanently wet areas or natural stone, not paintable Seal the Joints in Your Bathroom & Kitchen in Minutes! Durability in Humid Environments Step 1: Completely remove any existing sealant and residues. Thoroughly clean the joint to remove contaminants and allow to dry. Step 2: Cut off the tip of the cartridge above the screw thread. Remove nozzle cap and trim nozzle to fit the joint width. screw the nozzle onto the cartridge. Simple & Precise Application Step 3: Insert the cartridge into a cartridge gun. Step 4: Pull the trigger to apply sealant into the joint. Ensure the sealant has good contact with both sides of the joint. Easy & Fast Maintenance Step 5: Smooth sealant with sealant finishing tool within 5 minutes. Remove excess sealant immediately using white spirit. Anti mould sealant with high adhesion This sealant from UniBond forms a permanently flexible, mould resistant & waterproof barrier, ensuring strong seals and preventing mould growth. Its high adhesion creates a durable;e and long-lasting seal making it perfect for bathrooms and kitchens.
